title: Jordan Benedict Natural Sea Sponge, Unbleached Honeycomb Shower Sponge, Body Sponge on a Rope, Exfoliating Bath Sponge, Organic Bath Sponges for Adults(S Pack of 1)
features: Organic & Natural Sponge for Shower: Indulge in the ultimate shower luxury with our natural bath sponge—unbleached and free from synthetic chemicals, maintaining its natural brown colour and retaining all its good pH properties for a nurturing bath.
Hygienic & Hypoallergenic: Our toxin-free shower sponges for women and men are gentle on delicate skin types, free from allergens, irritants, and unpleasant odours.

Revitalising Bathing Sponge: Using our natural shower sponges for men and women in your daily routine stimulates blood flow to the skin, promoting healthy complexion while removing pollutants, oil, and dead skin cells for a revitalised appearance.

Spa-Like Experience: Turn your bath into a spa-like experience with our nourishing natural sponges. Highly absorbent and rich in lather, the soft sponge provides a luxurious massage, perfect for a well-deserved relaxation after a hectic day.

Sustainable Gifts: Looking for an eco friendly bath sponge to surprise a loved one? Packaged in recyclable and giftable boxes, all of our sea sponges are ethically sourced from suppliers and collectors that follow ecological methods of harvesting.
description: Product Description THE SECRET TO GORGEOUS, SOFT, & HEALTHY SKIN : Pamper Yourself to the Nature's Finest Natural Sea Sponge Soft and Durable Luxury Quality Honeycomb Sponges 100% Natural, hand-cut sponges Support traditional artisan trade Natural Gift Ideas for Christmas, Birthdays, Baby Shower, Anniversaries, etc Natural Sea Sponges for Bathing, Shower, and Exfoliation Natural Sea Sponges for Baby, Women, and Adults Great Loofah Sponge Alternative Natural Face Care Sea Sponges, sustainable natural alternatives to Konjac Sponges Embrace Natural Sea Sponges and De Plastic Your Life Feel Greatness of Oceans Gift, A Great Natural Gift Idea Say no to Plastic Shower Puffs 100% NATURAL & ORGANIC (Model Feature Large Size) Luxury Face Care Sponge Luxury Wool Sponge Luxury Sea Sponge Compressed Sea Sponge Add To Basket Add To Basket Buying Options Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.3 out of 5 stars 150 4.2 out of 5 stars 146 4.3 out of 5 stars 255 4.2 out of 5 stars 141 Price £13.75 £ 13 . 75 £16.75 £ 16 . 75 — no data £23.75 £ 23 . 75 Packaging Gift Box Gift Box Gift Box Flat Gift Box Cotton Rope NONE ✓ ✓ ✓ Thoughtful Gift Idea for Any Occasion Our Sponges come in Giftable boxes. Sea sponges make a thoughtful Gift Idea for every occasion. Pamper your loved ones with the goodness of nature Goodness of Sea on your Skin Our Sea sponges contain enzymes that inhibit mold and bacteria growth. They are hypoallergenic and free of chemicals, artificial by-products, or toxins. With every move feel the refreshing softness of the sea. Sustainably Natural Always Our Sea Sponges are Sourced from Responsible Sources in Greece, who have been in the trade over many generations. We ensure that they follow ethical practices and sponges are harvested and farmed in a sustainable way. All sponges are cut leaving the root to allow regrowth Support a Noble Cause We donate 5% or more of our profit from Your Purchase to support our local School and College for Special Needs Children in Essex called Columbus School and College. ENJOY CLEANER, SMOOTHER, AND YOUNGER LOOKING SKIN Directions for First Use: Natural sea sponges may contain sea shells or other sea particles left over after the cleaning process. Extreme care should be taken to thoroughly rinse the sponge and remove any debris before first use to avoid injury. Wash the sponge thoroughly before first use. Add a small quantity of bath foam and massage your body with circular moves. After use remember to rinse the sponge thoroughly and gently squeeze the water out and dry the sponge. Sea sponges are not meant for Strength Testing :), hence should not attempt to pull it apart. Periodic Care: 1) Rinse the sponge under cold running water. 2) Soak the sponge into a bowl with water and vinegar or baking soda solution to a 10:1 analogy, and leave to soak for 8 hours. 3) Remove it from the bowl and squeeze it to remove excess liquid. 4) Set out to dry on a clean surface, such as the bathtub, or hang out to dry using the hanging cord. 5) Use again. The sponge should be as good as new. Important Note: SHAPE, COLOUR, and SIZE Due to the natural origin of the sea sponge, there might be instances where the sponge you receive slightly varies in shape and/or color from those presented in pictures. Rest assured however that you have made the right choice since all our products are of excellent quality. Please note that Sponges are often cut from bigger pieces, this does not reduce their durability or quality. Sizes are approximate. Quick Tip: The product comes with a hanging cord which will be particularly useful for hanging and drying your honeycomb sponge. Drying your sponge is essential in order to prolong its life and maintain hygiene. Product Safety Warning Natural sea sponges may contain sea shells or other sea particles left over after the cleaning process. Extreme care should be taken to thoroughly rinse the sponge and remove any debris before first use to avoid injury.
